Utils Widgets Logic Module

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.document_dialog_logic.DocumentDialogLogic(parent)

Class that contains the logic of the document dialog.

change_archetype(archetype: int) → None

Select archetype to clone.

Parameters:

archetype – archetype index.

create_document(archetype: str) → None

Clone document archetype and adds to project documents list.

Parameters:

archetype – archetype index.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.main_window_logic.MainWindowLogic(parent)

Class that contains the logic of the main window.

add_object(obj: ObjectArchetypeProxy) → None

Adds a child to the selected object.

Parameters:

obj – The object to be cloned and inserted.

combo_box_add_item()

Adds an item to the combo box.

select_object(index: QModelIndex) → None

Updates selected object, focus object and enables accepted archetypes in the ribbon.

Parameters:

index – index of object in the QTreeWidget.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.project_dialog_logic.ProjectDialogLogic(parent)

Select archetype to clone.

Parameters:

archetype – archetype index.

create_project(path, archetype) → None

Create a new project. :param path: path of project archetype.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.properties_logic.PropertiesLogic(parent)

Class that contains the logic of the property dialog.

load_widgets()

Method that load the widgets.

save_changes() → None

Method that saves the changes of the properties in the project.

Method that updates the properties of the object.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.CreateDocument(project: Project, document: Object, app, index: int)

Command to create project documents.

redo() → None

Inserts document to project documents list. Set object state to FRESH. Set objects’s children to FRESH.

undo() → None

Removes document from project documents list. Removes object state. Removes object’s children states.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.CreateObject(project: Project, parent_obj: Object, obj: Object)

Command to insert an object to a given parent. Adds a previously cloned object to the end of parent children list.

redo() → None

Inserts object to parent children list. Set object state to FRESH. Set parent’s object to DIRTY.

undo() → None

Removes object from parent children list. Removes object state. Set parent’s state to previous state.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.DeleteDocument(project: Project, document: Object, app, combo_box_index: int)

Command to delete document from project.

redo()

Deletes document from project documents list. Sets all objects in document to DELETED.

undo()

Inserts document to project documents list. Sets all objects states to previous states.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.DeleteObject(project: Project, parent: Object, child_obj: Object)

Command to delete an object.

redo()

Removes node from parent children list. Set object state to DELETED. Set parent’s object to DIRTY.

undo()

Inserts node to parent children list. Set object state to previous state. Set parent’s state to previous state.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.MoveNode(project: Project, obj: Object, from_parent: Object, to_parent: Object, from_row: int, to_row: int)

Command to move node in project tree.

redo()

Removes node from old position and insert in the new one.

undo()

Removes node from new position and insert back in old position.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.UpdateObject(project: Project, obj: Object, new_obj: Object, app)

Command to update node attributes.

redo()

Update node dict attributes. Set object state to DIRTY.

undo()

Replace node attributes with old attributes. Set object state to previous state.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.UpdateProject(project: Project, new_project: Project, app)

Command to update node attributes.

redo()

Update node dict attributes. Set object state to DIRTY.

undo()

Replace node attributes with old attributes. Set object state to previous state.

proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.change_combo_box(app, index=None)

This function changes the combo box of the document dialog. And updates the combobox with the new documents.

class proteus.controllers.utils.widgets_logic.ribbons_logic.RibbonsLogic(parent)

Class that contains the ribbon logic.

init_tabs(content: dict) → None

Add tabs to ribbon and adds archetypes buttons.

set_archetypes()

Set archetypes to ribbon from object archetypes.
